result.eng: A journey to the centre of the earth.
result.html: turas go croí na cruinneA journey to the centre of the earth.
result.ponchtml: turas go croí na cruinneA journey to the centre of the earth.

result.eng: The tour was cancelled because of bad weather.
result.ga: cuireadh an turas ar ceal de bharr drochaimsire
result.orig: Cuireadh an turas ar ceal de bharr drochaimsire
result.html: cuireadh an turas ar ceal de bharr drochaimsireThe tour was cancelled because of bad weather.
result.ponchtml: cuireaḋ an turas ar ceal de ḃarr droċaimsireThe tour was cancelled because of bad weather.

result.ga: d'ullmhaigh sé le haghaidh an turais
result.orig: D'ullmhaigh sé le haghaidh an turais
result.html: d'ullmhaigh sé le haghaidh an turaisHe prepared for the journey.
result.ponchtml: d'ullṁaiġ sé le haġaiḋ an turaisHe prepared for the journey.

result.eng: Because of the bad weather, the tour was cancelled.
result.ga: mar gheall ar an drochaimsir cuireadh an turas ar ceal
result.orig: Mar gheall ar an drochaimsir cuireadh an turas ar ceal
result.html: mar gheall ar an drochaimsir cuireadh an turas ar cealBecause of the bad weather, the tour was cancelled.
result.ponchtml: mar ġeall ar an droċaimsir cuireaḋ an turas ar cealBecause of the bad weather, the tour was cancelled.

result.ga: slán leat agus bain sult as an turas
result.orig: Slán leat agus bain sult as an turas
result.html: slán leat agus bain sult as an turasGood-bye and enjoy the trip.
result.ponchtml: slán leat agus bain sult as an turasGood-bye and enjoy the trip.

result.ga: turas in aisce a bhí ann
result.orig: Turas in aisce a bhí ann
result.html: turas in aisce a bhí annThe trip was pointless.
result.ponchtml: turas in aisce a ḃí annThe trip was pointless.

result.ga: tógann an turas ceithre huaire an chloig
result.orig: Tógann an turas ceithre huaire an chloig
result.html: tógann an turas ceithre huaire an chloigThe journey takes four hours.
result.ponchtml: tógann an turas ceiṫre huaire an ċloigThe journey takes four hours.
